H0.text: Which mountain overlooks Rio De Janeiro and its harbour. Corcovado

H2.text: Which mountain overlooks Rio De Janeiro and its harbour. Tijuca Peak

H3.text: Which mountain overlooks Rio De Janeiro and its harbour. Sugarloaf

A4.text: Sugarloaf Mountain is a peak situated in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on a peninsula at the mouth of Guanabara Bay.

A5.text: Rising 396 m (1,299 ft) above the harbor, the peak is named for its resemblance to the traditional shape of concentrated refined loaf sugar.
